GrxAccess.android:title: Select app, activity or shortcut
GrxAccess.android:summary: Select what to launch when clicking on clock

GrxCheckBoxPreference.android:title: Separate colors for text and arrows
GrxCheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Text and arrows can be colored separately
GrxCheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Text color will apply to arrows as well

GrxCheckBoxPreference.android:title: Separate colors for text and arrows
GrxCheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Text and arrows can be colored separately
GrxCheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Text color will apply to arrows as well

GrxCheckBoxPreference.android:title: Separate colors for text and arrows
GrxCheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Text and arrows can be colored separately
GrxCheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Text color will apply to arrows as well

GrxSwitchPreference.android:title: Use LTE mobile data icon instead 4G
GrxSwitchPreference.android:summary: The icon will change when connectivity conditions changes, like signal intensity.
